languages.text: "На данный момент я не наблюдаю признаков эпидемий или других масштабных угроз жизни экипажу... сверх обычного. Малые вспышки болезней — часть естественного процесса убыли экипажа. Медикарии заняты лечением производственных и боевых травм, а также спорадически вспыхивающих хворей".

"I am currently not aware of any epidemics or other large-scale threats to the lives of the crew... or anything more serious than normal, at least. Minor outbreaks are part of the natural decline process. The medicae are occupied with treating both industrial and combat injuries as well as dealing with sporadically occurring ailments."
languages.original_text: "На данный момент я не наблюдаю признаков эпидемий или других масштабных угроз жизни экипажу... сверх обычного. Малые вспышки болезней — часть естественного процесса убыли экипажа. Медикарии заняты лечением производственных и боевых травм, а также спорадически вспыхивающих хворей".

languages.text: "Mir sind derzeit keine Epidemien oder anderen Gefahren für das Leben der Crew bekannt ... jedenfalls nicht ernsteres als üblich. Kleinere Ausbrüche sind Teil des natürlichen Verfalls. Die Medicae sind mit der Behandlung von Arbeits- und Kampfverletzungen beschäftigt und kümmern sich nebenher um sporadisch auftretende Gebrechen."
languages.original_text: "I am currently not aware of any epidemics or other large-scale threats to the lives of the crew... or anything more serious than normal, at least. Minor outbreaks are part of the natural decline process. The medicae are occupied with treating both industrial and combat injuries as well as dealing with sporadically occurring ailments."

traits.locale_text: "Mir sind derzeit keine Epidemien oder anderen Gefahren für das Leben der Crew bekannt ... jedenfalls nicht ernsteres als üblich. Kleinere Ausbrüche sind Teil des natürlichen Verfalls. Die Medicae sind mit der Behandlung von Arbeits- und Kampfverletzungen beschäftigt und kümmern sich nebenher um sporadisch auftretende Gebrechen."

languages.text: « À ma connaissance, nous n'avons actuellement à déplorer aucune épidémie ou autre menace d'ampleur susceptible de compromettre la sécurité de l'équipage... Rien qui sorte de l'ordinaire, en tout cas. Les maladies mineures font partie intégrante du processus de vieillissement naturel. Les officiers de la medicae se chargent de soigner les blessures subies au travail ou en combat, ainsi que les affections qui surviennent occasionnellement. »
languages.original_text: "I am currently not aware of any epidemics or other large-scale threats to the lives of the crew... or anything more serious than normal, at least. Minor outbreaks are part of the natural decline process. The medicae are occupied with treating both industrial and combat injuries as well as dealing with sporadically occurring ailments."

traits.locale_text: « À ma connaissance, nous n'avons actuellement à déplorer aucune épidémie ou autre menace d'ampleur susceptible de compromettre la sécurité de l'équipage... Rien qui sorte de l'ordinaire, en tout cas. Les maladies mineures font partie intégrante du processus de vieillissement naturel. Les officiers de la medicae se chargent de soigner les blessures subies au travail ou en combat, ainsi que les affections qui surviennent occasionnellement. »

languages.text: «En estos momentos no tengo constancia de ninguna epidemia o amenaza similar para las vidas de la tripulación... ni de nada más grave de lo habitual. Los brotes de enfermedades no virulentas forman parte del deterioro natural. Los medicae estamos ocupados tratando heridas de combate y accidentes industriales, así como la ocasional dolencia menor».
languages.original_text: "I am currently not aware of any epidemics or other large-scale threats to the lives of the crew... or anything more serious than normal, at least. Minor outbreaks are part of the natural decline process. The medicae are occupied with treating both industrial and combat injuries as well as dealing with sporadically occurring ailments."

traits.locale_text: «En estos momentos no tengo constancia de ninguna epidemia o amenaza similar para las vidas de la tripulación... ni de nada más grave de lo habitual. Los brotes de enfermedades no virulentas forman parte del deterioro natural. Los medicae estamos ocupados tratando heridas de combate y accidentes industriales, así como la ocasional dolencia menor».

languages.text: 「今のところ、クルーの命に係わる伝染病やその他の大規模な脅威があるとは認識していません…少なくとも、通常のもの以上に深刻なものはありません。小規模な感染症は自然に衰退していく過程の途上にあります。メディケアは労働災害や戦闘災害の治療と、散発的に発生する病気の対応に追われています」
languages.original_text: "I am currently not aware of any epidemics or other large-scale threats to the lives of the crew... or anything more serious than normal, at least. Minor outbreaks are part of the natural decline process. The medicae are occupied with treating both industrial and combat injuries as well as dealing with sporadically occurring ailments."

traits.locale_text: 「今のところ、クルーの命に係わる伝染病やその他の大規模な脅威があるとは認識していません…少なくとも、通常のもの以上に深刻なものはありません。小規模な感染症は自然に衰退していく過程の途上にあります。メディケアは労働災害や戦闘災害の治療と、散発的に発生する病気の対応に追われています」

languages.text: “船上没有爆发大型传染病，船员的健康也没有受到重大威胁……至少可以说，目前一切都处于正常范围内。小规模疫情爆发是自然选择的一部分。所有医务官都在忙着治疗船员在生产与战斗期间受到的伤害，处理零星发生的疾病。”
languages.original_text: "I am currently not aware of any epidemics or other large-scale threats to the lives of the crew... or anything more serious than normal, at least. Minor outbreaks are part of the natural decline process. The medicae are occupied with treating both industrial and combat injuries as well as dealing with sporadically occurring ailments."

traits.locale_text: “船上没有爆发大型传染病，船员的健康也没有受到重大威胁……至少可以说，目前一切都处于正常范围内。小规模疫情爆发是自然选择的一部分。所有医务官都在忙着治疗船员在生产与战斗期间受到的伤害，处理零星发生的疾病。”

languages.text: "Şu anda mürettebatın canını tehlikeye atan herhangi bir salgından veya büyük çaplı bir sorundan, en azından normalin üzerinde ciddiyete sahip herhangi bir şeyden haberdar değilim. Küçük salgınlar, doğal azalış sürecinin bir parçasıdır. Sıhhiyeciler, hem endüstriyel hem de çatışma kaynaklı yaraları tedavi etmenin yanı sıra gelişigüzel meydana gelen rahatsızlıklarla ilgilenmekle meşgul."
languages.original_text: "I am currently not aware of any epidemics or other large-scale threats to the lives of the crew... or anything more serious than normal, at least. Minor outbreaks are part of the natural decline process. The medicae are occupied with treating both industrial and combat injuries as well as dealing with sporadically occurring ailments."
